Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 23rd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1969...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/24/1975, off Gabriel Vargas (MAN)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/8/1975, off Brett Ramthun (PG)...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Toledo on 2/12/1978 (Going to TOL: 3B R. Hearns, 2B P. Reaves. Going to PIT: 3B G. Freeman)...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/28/1981 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by West Texas on 2/15/1982 to a 3-year deal worth $799,000 per year...
